snippet: The “Mangia Hoboken!” excursion takes the back streets, making more than half a dozen stops at mostly family-run specialty stores, including Carlo’s Bakery, home of the “Cake Boss.”
abstract: Mangia Hoboken!, a three-and-a-half hour tour highlighting the culinary culture of the city, makes more than half a dozen stops at mostly family-run specialty stores, including Carlo’s Bakery, home of television program Cake Boss (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: The “Mangia Hoboken!” excursion takes the back streets, making more than half a dozen stops at mostly family-run specialty stores, including Carlo’s Bakery, home of the “Cake Boss.”

headline.seo: Finding More in Hoboken Than the Cake Boss
headline.main: Coming for ‘Cake Boss’ and Finding More
headline.print_headline: Coming for ‘Cake Boss’ And Finding More
